LanguageData.FloorEvergreen.label: Evergreen Floor
LanguageData.FloorEvergreen.description: A moss blanket that will never wither nor die. Useful for indoor exhibits or aviary domes.
LanguageData.FloorPavedDino.label: Paved Floor
LanguageData.FloorPavedDino.description: Tan coloured rounded slabs laid out in an interlocking pattern. Often used as paths.
LanguageData.FloorTileDino.label: Tiled Floor
LanguageData.FloorTileDino.description: Usually acts as a border. Grey slabs of stone laid out in a tiled fashion.
LanguageData.FloorWaterDino.label: Water
LanguageData.FloorWaterDino.description: A ditch of shallow water. Perfect for watering holes or estuarine dinosaurs.
LanguageData.FloorWaterDino.tools.water.label: water
